statements: DELETE FROM expenses_and_income WHERE project_name = 'Project X';
DELETE FROM expenses_and_income WHERE project_name = 'Project A' AND expense_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM expenses_and_income WHERE expense_date < '2022-01-01' AND (expense_amount > 500 OR income_amount < 2000);
DELETE FROM income WHERE project_id = 100 AND income_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE id = 25 AND project_id = 10;
DELETE FROM income WHERE income_date < '2022-01-01' AND amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE expense_id = 101 AND project_id = 201;
DELETE FROM income WHERE income_id = 202 OR income_date < '2022-01-01';
